content.raw:
Well, that is not quite true: a list of affine transformation 3x3 matrices (M1, M2, M3... Mn) can be expressed as a single 3x3 matrix M = M3 *M2 *M1. You can see something like this in the implementation of rotation (translation * rotation * translation).
However, when I get around to support multiple transfromations (the parsing assumes a single one for now), I can put these matrices in a list. This might be easier to debug if there is a problem.
